headline: Pennsylvania American Water Asks Customers in 12 Counties to Reduce Nonessential Water Use During Drought Watch Declaration
summary: MECHANICSBURG, Pa., October 09, 2025--Pennsylvania American Water is encouraging customers throughout portions of its statewide service territory to voluntarily reduce their water consumption in response to the drought watch declaration announced this week by the Pennsylvania Department of Environmental Protection (DEP). While the company always encourages wise water use, Pennsylvania American Water is asking residents and businesses to voluntarily reduce their nonessential water use by 10-15% (

headline: Is American Water Works Stock Still Attractive After Climbing 14% in Early 2025?
summary: If you’re eyeing American Water Works Company and wondering whether it’s wise to buy, hold, or move on, you’re definitely not alone. This stock has been drawing attention lately, especially after putting up a solid 13.9% return since the start of the year. Over the past week, shares climbed 3.6%, which has some people speculating about renewed enthusiasm for utilities after months of relative calm. On the other hand, the five-year performance is slightly negative at -0.4%. This might raise an...

headline: American Water's Unit Buys Water Assets of South Orange Village
summary: AWK's unit, New Jersey American Water, will further expand in the state with a new acquisition, adding 5,000 customers.

raw.headline: American Water's Unit Buys Water Assets of South Orange Village

headline: American Water to Discuss Third Quarter 2025 Earnings and Initiation of 2026 Earnings Guidance on October 30, 2025
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., October 09, 2025--American Water Works Company, Inc. (NYSE: AWK) announced today that it intends to release its 2025 third quarter financial results, 2026 earnings guidance and long-term financial targets after the market closes on Wednesday, October 29, 2025.
